src:
Hasil Pertandingan Persela Lamongan vs Barito Putera: Skor 0-0
04 Nov 2019, 20:42 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persela Lamongan hanya bisa bermain imbang 0-0 lawan Barito Putera di pekan ke-27 Shopee Liga 1 2019 di Stadion Surajaya, Senin (4/11/2019).
Bermain di depan pendukungnya, Persela langsung mengancam melalui dua peluang Malik Risaldi pada menit keenam dan 14. Peluang perdana hadir melalui tembakan kaki kanan yang masih melebar dari gawang Barito Putera.
Adapun peluang kedua Malik Risaldi hadir melalui sundulan yang berhasil ditangkap kiper Aditya Harlan. Setelah itu, Persela makin mendominasi jalannya pertandingan. Pasukan Nilmaizar mengepung lini pertahanan Barito Putera, namun tetap tak berhasil mencetak gol.
Pada menit ke-37, giliran Barito Putera sejatinya berhasil membobol gawang Persela memalui tendangan Donny Monim. Namun, gol dianulir wasit karena menganggap sang pemain sudah lebih dulu berada dalam posisi offiside. Hingga turun minum, tak ada gol yang tercipta.
Memasuki paruh kedua laga, Persela makin agresif melancarkan serangan. Adapun Barito Putera lebih memilih bermain menunggu sembari sesekali melancarkan serangan balik.
Pada menit ke-75, Kei Hirose hampir mendapatkan peluang melalui tendangan bebas dari luar kotak penalti. Sayangnya, pemain asal Jepang itu gagal mencatatkan namanya di papan skor karena bola hasil sepakannya melambung di atas gawang.
Persela kemudian mendapatkan peluang lagi untuk mencetak gol melalui Alex dos Santos Goncalves pada menit ke-86. Namun, pemain asal Brasil itu gagal memaksimalkan peluang karena bola hasil sepakannya melayang di atas gawang Aditya Harlan.
Pada akhirnya sampai menit ke-90, plus tambahan waktu tiga menit, tak ada gol yang tercipta. Persela Lamongan dan Barito Putera pun harus puas bermain imbang 0-0.
text:
Match Results Persela Lamongan vs Barito Putera: Score 0-0
Nov 04 2019, 20:42 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persela Lamongan can only draw 0-0 against Barito Putera in the 27th week of Shopee Liga 1 2019 at Surajaya Stadium on Monday (11/04/2019).
Playing in front of his supporters, Persela immediately threatened through two chances Malik Risaldi in the sixth and 14th minutes. The first opportunity was present through a right-footed shot that was still wide of the goal Barito Putera.
The second chance Malik Risaldi was present through a header that was successfully captured by goalkeeper Aditya Harlan. After that, Persela increasingly dominated the game. Nilmaizar's troops surrounded Barito Putera's defense, but still failed to score.
In the 37th minute, Barito Putera's turn actually managed to break into the Persela goal through Donny Monim's shot. However, the referee disallowed a goal because he assumed the player was already in the off position Until halftime, no goals were created.
Entering the second half of the fight, Persela increasingly aggressive attack. The Barito Putera prefers to play while occasionally launching a counterattack.
In the 75th minute, Kei Hirose almost got a chance through a free kick from outside the penalty box. Unfortunately, the Japanese player failed to register his name on the scoreboard because the results of his kick ball bounced over the goal.
Persela then got another chance to score through Alex dos Santos Goncalves in the 86th minute. However, the Brazilian player failed to maximize opportunities because the results of his kick floated above Aditya Harlan's goal.
In the end until the 90th minute, plus an additional three minutes, no goals were created. Persela Lamongan and Barito Putera also had to settle for a 0-0 draw.
